location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Plan No 3 ‘Route Plan of Robat Nala’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 610 x 910mm, on sheet 660 x 1015mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the route of Robat Nala, highlighted in red.The scale is 1 inch to 500 feet, and was produced from a sketch by Surgeon Major George Washington Brazier-Creagh. It bears a stamp which reads ‘Intelligence Division. 14 Dec 1898’.The map bears the printing statements ‘Reg. No. 162, Print., I.–July.98.–123.’ and ‘Litho., S.I.O., Calcutta.’.
